# UITextAutocorrectionType.default

**Case**

Specifies an appropriate autocorrection behavior for the current script system.

## Declaration

```swift
case `default`
```

## Constants

- **UITextAutocorrectionType.no**: Disables autocorrection behavior.
- **UITextAutocorrectionType.yes**: Enables autocorrection behavior.
title: UITextAutocorrectionType.default
